title: Oxfordshire County Council OCCLSS
alertText: An alert is messaging that tells the user some information. Alerts can be error, warning, success, or info messages
quoteText: A block quotation (also known as a long quotation or extract) is a quotation in a written document, that is set off from the main text as a paragraph, or block of text, and typically distinguished visually using indentation and a different typeface or smaller size quotation.
